entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reflection free mode: using sqlclient - possible options for obfuscation #96339
  • "No LC_RPATH's found" when loading native libraries on macOS #96337
  • CG2-specific failure in JIT/Intrinsics/TypeIntrinsics_r.csproj and TypeIntrinsics_ro.csproj #96336
    9.0.0
  • Emit `Producers` section when compiling to wasm #96334
  • Startup regression on Linux in TE benchmarks #96331
  • XmlSerializer doesn't allow to specify a fallback Timezone when deserializing to DateTimeOffset #96329
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization rafactor condition checks #96328
  • Debug.Assert exception I encountered when using Debug version System.Private.CoreLib.dll with mono runtime #96324

Closed

  • DateTime.ToString with different behavior from local machine and Azure DevOps #96335
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfNotZero` #84415
  • unexpected exception in C# dynamic method invocation with optional struct parameter in .NET48 #96330
  • .NET 8 macOS *.app does not launch after code signing #95727

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Creation of unsuspendable threads does not need to synchronize with the caller. #96338
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean up testgrouping.proj and move JIT/Intrinsics under JIT.1 #96333
    area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add extra trimming warning suppression #96327
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix wasm Codespaces prebuild #96326
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Build Linux NativeAOT runtime packs #96323
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Improve branch optimizer around implied relops #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing in wrappers for valuetypes with an explicit l… #96230
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsPrimitive #96226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enhance OSX's ProcessManager to extract process names from their paths #96287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • PGO: Profile Buffer.Memmove's length #96311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #96319
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [HybridGlobalization] Fix xamarin_macios build after system ICU change #96270
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wip] [mono] Enable some of the disabled JIT/Directed/callconv/ runtime tests #96243
    needs-area-label
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow preinitializing `AppContext.TryGetSwitch` #95948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: State of C++/CLI with dotnet #37667

Closed

  • Blazor WASM AOT publish fails with .NET 8 in Docker: `libatomic.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory` #37668
  • Git commit ID included in assembly ProductVersion field when building with sdk 8 #34568
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `CannotReOrderStructProperties` rule to API-Compat #37662
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Add `--framework` option to restore command #37459
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • init tool list format option #37394
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add "Dynamic vs. Static Binding" section to params-collections.md #7792

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Regression] False positive in nullable analysis of local functions #71419
  • [Bug]: Code action `Simplify conditional expression` leads to incorrect formatting #71418
  • VS 2022 preview 3.1: CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider Exception #71417

Closed

  • Exclude switch arms from brace placement options #57854
    Next
  • Unable to open solution in MSbuild #71198

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't start the cohost server at all if Razor doesn't want to #71416
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow switch arms to start a line with an open brace #70014
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add line continuation tests for string concatenation #70305
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update EA layer for ASP.NET #68503
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Force public APIs to return complete results #68804
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [Inline Rename] Update the UI related to Copilot #71332
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Additional work to release unused PreviewWorkspace memory #68054
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • #66116 Long switch expression is duplicated in InferTypesWorker_DoNot… #71412
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Reduce allocations observed in local trace opening Roslyn.sln #68076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Lazily calculate preview operations #68214
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce scope of banned API suppressions to only what is necessary #70303
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move background initialization to OnAfterPackageLoadedAsync #71047
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rust built WASM library in Blazor project fails on wasm-opt when being published #53034
  • BlazorWasm benchmark broken (docker version) #53033
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #53031
  • Add a AddDefaultProblemDetailsFactory method that allows registering the internal `DefaultProblemDetailsFactory` class with the container #53030
  • Blazor Web App when in debug mode is OK but when pushed to server then problem #53029
  • .NET Core 8+ Api failing intermittently (w/ Swagger) #53028
  • ClickOnce generates unnessesary and breaking staticwebassets.runtime.json file #53027
  • Happy Holidays, everyone! Responses for issues may be delayed till early January #53026
  • HtmlHelperOptions.CheckBoxHiddenInputRenderMode is ignored #53025
  • Issue with multiple EditForm on the same page #53019
  • Remove call UseRouting #53018
  • High Memory Usage on AMD EPYC 7282 Compared to Intel Xeon E5-2630 v4 with .NET 8.0 #53017

Closed

  • [Feature Request][ Blazor New API Security end points Please have better Linkage between new security api end points /login / logout etc storing of tokens and the Blazor Web App New Project Template #53006
  • AuthorizeView non-functional with InteractiveServer and Windows (Negotiate) Auth #52921
  • Razor compiler emits neither warning nor error when binding against non-existent property. #53020
  • Auth For Blazor To Be One #53007
  • Blazor 8 Render mode breaks migrations over 3rd party components. #53008
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter, updates #52992

PullRequests

Created

  • Add polymorphic support to SignalR STJ #53035
    area-signalr
  • Skip npm get-version to unblock builds #53032
    area-infrastructure
  • fix: Added missing AddOptions() to AddLocalization. #53016
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Updated

  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix duplicated place holder in log message #53009
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Update Login.razor to pass ApplicationUser to SignInManager instead o… #52984
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #52908
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make Identity tests use public API to configure EF. #52910
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Skip failing Libuv test on Alpine #52912
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 6.0.x
  • Annotate Http.Connections for trimming #52918
    area-signalr, linker-friendliness, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance of navigation between two pages in a MAUI Shell app is really very poor. Taking more than 4-5 secs to navigate to a page #19605
  • Update API Docs for Windows Life Cycle events #19601
    Backlog
  • Strange warning about android version #19599
  • Character dIsplayed very differently in Android and Windows. #19597
  • Font not found in Android, but works well in Windows. #19596
  • MAUI pack problem #19595

Closed

  • I Want to disabled minisize button and close button,but I can't find how to setting it. #19586
  • App Icon for iOS is not created when app icon is not a multiplier by 8 #9067
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Resizetizer Regex Fix #19600
    community ✨

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0.0]: Defining a collection value conversion in ConfigureConventions throws InvalidOperationException #32682
  • Issue with circular navigation properties when using SqlServer #32681
  • Getting errors when mixing DbFunction and SqlQueryRaw #32680
  • Exception when writing a JSON column with negative enum value #32679
  • Using these could lead to Memory Leak? #32678

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Preserve unicodeness and fixed-lengthiness in compiled model. #32683
    Servicing-consider

Updated

  • Preserve unicodeness and fixed-lengthiness in compiled model. #32662

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-27

Issues

Created

  • Add `--source` for `dotnet tool install` - for specifying the package source url #18042
